name: One click SPACE
description:
This Game was Functionally Created for the -"Boundless Game Jam"

The theme of the Jam was "One Button"
So we created this Game which Uses One Button - "The Right Click Mouse Button"

This game is a little space shooter where you control your ship with the mouse (the spaceship follows your mouse, the longer your mouse is, the faster the ship will go!

We had a TON of fun making this game

Hope you too will have fun Playing this game

Music credits :
OVERWERK - Virtue

OVERWERK s' channel : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCJPp8C9j1vIUWA4dSksfZ0g

-> If you liked the game, don't forget to leave a feedback and a cool rating it will help us a lot!
